Build ID: tptpaide-2007-03-05-02-47-46

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Create a new default MRT i,e new_file.mrt
2.Select "Add Service Group Capability for Manageability Endpoint definition" checkbox and save the editor
3.Now generate code from MRT i,e new_file.mrt, error throws up

1) During the code generation ServiceGroupCapability.mcap and ServiceGroupCapability.rmd  are added to and deleted from the workspace.
Web Project Created after the code generation does not work with Managed Agent Explorer.We have to do some modifications in muse.xml to work with the Managed Agent Explorer.

When trying to connect Managed Agent Explorer i am getting below problem similar to codegeneration problem
